price: Be gracious, enjoin what is right and turn away from those who are ignorant[89].
arabic: خُذِ ٱلۡعَفۡوَ وَأۡمُرۡ بِٱلۡعُرۡفِ وَأَعۡرِضۡ عَنِ ٱلۡجَٰهِلِينَ
footnotes: [89] i.e., turn a blind eye and pretend to take no notice of their abuse.
